ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Classic
ygData.msgSnippet: I have to admit, I m not as old school as most of you. I d love to try it to get the feel of what everyone went through before the expansions.  I ve heard
ygData.messageBody:
I have to admit, I'm not as old school as most of you.
I'd love to try it to get the feel of what everyone
went through before the expansions. I've heard
excellent stories from friends who've played since the
beginning, when dropping your first giant would really
mean something. Just seems it would be a good idea to
get first had experience of the history in this game.

--- Greg <freechylde@...> wrote:

> Hey Kids...Been gone awhile...been busy..
>
> Anyway, in talking to my old EQ chums and with what
> I read on the
> websites, there is/has been some talk about SOE
> making a "classic"
> server.
>
> Now the "classic" server would be EQ prior to PoP,
> no adds or toys,
> with the exception of the stuff necessary. This
> would mean no PoK, no
> Guild Lobby, etc.
>
> Knowing that many of you have been here since around
> Beta or just after
> and that most of you can honestly say " I remember
> when... or Back in
> the Day we had to run from X t Y and it was 4 day
> run...."; I am
> curious to know if any of you kids would use such a
> server, or have you
> all become stuck on how things are now that going
> back to the old way
> would kill the game for you?
>
> As always, but now just plainly nosey..
>
> Greg
>
>
>
>
